Universal- creating a conglomerate that will be the largest cable provider, the largest Internet provider, and one of the largest content producers in the United States- represents a surrender to the demands of corporate America. Once we allow companies to become this powerful, the FCC does not regulate them, said Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I., Vt.).`` They regulate the FCC.'' No reasonable regulator would debate Bernie Sanders ' point- or the threat to democracy posed by abandoning protections against media monopolies.
